title: Create CoolGPT4 chat interface

requirements.text: Create a backend actor that stores and retrieves chat messages with fields for message text, timestamp, and sender role (user or assistant)
acceptanceCriteria: Backend can store chat messages persistently
Messages include text content, timestamp, and role
Backend provides methods to add and retrieve messages

requirements.text: Build a chat interface with a message list displaying conversation history and a text input area with send button for submitting new messages
acceptanceCriteria: Messages display in chronological order with sender identification
User can type and submit messages via input field
Submitted messages appear in the conversation view

requirements.text: Implement message sending functionality that posts user messages to the backend and displays them in the chat interface
acceptanceCriteria: User messages are sent to backend when submitted
Chat interface updates immediately after sending

requirements.text: Apply a modern, sleek chat application design with a clean layout, contemporary typography, and a professional color scheme distinct from blue and purple
acceptanceCriteria: Design uses a cohesive color palette that is not blue or purple
Layout is clean with proper spacing and visual hierarchy
Overall aesthetic is professional and contemporary

constraints: Frontend must use React, Tailwind CSS, and React Query
Do not modify immutable frontend paths including useInternetIdentity hooks, useActor.ts, main.tsx, or components/ui
nonGoals: AI response generation or LLM integration
Multi-user chat rooms or direct messaging between users
